H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H8163.def: = a fairly small, male domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and long hair, and usually found in one single {L:flock<SDBH:צֹאן>} with sheep; ► raised for its hair, often used for sacrifices; a clean animal, and therefore to be eaten

H905.def: = woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of clothes; worn by priests and supernatural beings; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness

H4503.def: = objects given to a person of high status; ► sometimes this is done on a voluntary basis as a show of respect for the recipient and in order to win that person's favor; in other cases this is done to fulfill the requirements imposed by the recipient

H5262.def: = a physical likeness or representation of a person, animal, or thing; ◄ made by pouring molten metal into a mold; ► functions as an object of non-sanctioned worship

H8345.def: = state in which a countable entity is the sixth in a range

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H8083.def: = state in which a countable entity is eight in number

H6499.def: = young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H352.def: = male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat-tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership

H702.def: = state in which a countable entity is four in number

H4399.def: = an activity involving a physical effort and usually requiring a certain amount of training or skill

H5207.def: literally: giving rest; hence: = causative process by which something causes a deity's anger to subside and make place for a favorable attitude

H7381.def: = a distinctive smell, which can be perceived as either pleasant or unpleasant; ≈ sometimes associated with the attitude a certain smell evokes in those who perceive it

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7126.def: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

H801.def: = action by which humans offer something to a deity by burning it partially or in its entirety on the altar; considered to have a pleasing aroma

H4150.def: = an action by which two or more parties come together for a particular purpose

H905.def: = woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of clothes; worn by priests and supernatural beings; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness

H5088.def: = action by which humans make a solemn promise to a deity, ► which signals a commitment to perform a certain act or behave in a specific way, usually in return for a blessing from the deity

H5071.def: = state in which humans are willing to perform a certain task and show that by their actions

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation
